PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
  MODULE STATUS_0100.																																
  MODULE INIT100.																																
  MODULE CLEAR_OKCODE.																																
																																
  CALL SUBSCREEN SUB100 INCLUDING SY-CPROG '2000'. "SELECTION-SCREEN																																
  LOOP AT GT_LIST INTO GS_LIST WITH CONTROL TC100.																																
    MODULE PBO_TC100.																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
																																
																																
																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
																																
  CALL SUBSCREEN SUB100.																																
  LOOP AT GT_LIST.																																
    MODULE PAI_TC100.																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
  MODULE USER_COMMAND_0100.
